message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway from $120, at $140?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $145, which is still a great deal for the product. I'm not willing to go any lower, though. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $145, Bob. I think that's a very reasonable price for this product, and I'm not willing to sacrifice my profit margins. If you're not willing to meet me at $145, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
